thread.title: France bids to keep rail reform on track

title: France bids to keep rail reform on track
text:
France bids to keep rail reform on track Thursday, March 01, 2018 - 01:50 
France's government has sought to overcome labour union resistance to a shake-up of the railways with a promise that the state-owned SNCF would receive 10 million euros a day of investment over the next decade. David Pollard reports.   
France's government has sought to overcome labour union resistance to a shake-up of the railways with a promise that the state-owned SNCF would receive 10 million euros a day of investment over the next decade. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2HXNtbI
